description: La aplicacin LCE pone teora y prctica al alcance de tu mano. Partiendo directamente de los seis libros de la serie El lder catequtico eficaz, la aplicacin LCE brinda a los lderes catequticos la oportunidad diaria de centrarse espiritualmente, enfocarse en asuntos pastorales especficos e identificar estrategias prcticas para asumir los desafos de servir como lder catequtico eficaz  La serie El lder catequtico eficaz, desarrollada en colaboracin con la Conferencia Nacional para el Liderazgo Catequtico (NCCL) y escrita por algunos de los lderes catequticos ms conocidos del pas, es la nica que abarca todos los aspectos del liderazgo catequtico. Proporciona las habilidades prcticas, estrategias y enfoques que aseguran un exitoso programa de formacin en la fe que crea una Iglesia dinmica.  Para obtener ms recursos, visita www.loyolapress.com/LCE LCE application puts the theory and practice at your fingertips. Starting directly from the six books in the series The effective catechetical leader, the LCE application provides catechetical leaders daily opportunity to focus spiritually, focus on specific pastoral issues and identify practical strategies to meet the challenges of serving as an effective catechetical leader  The effective catechetical series leader, developed in collaboration with the National Conference for Catechetical Leadership (NCCL) and written by some of the most famous catechetical leaders of the country, is the only one that covers all aspects of catechetical leadership. It provides practical skills, strategies and approaches that ensure a successful program of faith formation that creates a dynamic church.  For more resources, visit www.loyolapress.com/LCE
